thread.title: First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividend
thread.title_full: First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividend

title: First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividend October 23, 2015 09:00 ET | Source: First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. 
BUFFALO, N.Y., Oct. 23, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- First Niagara Financial Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: FNFG ) today announced that the Company's Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of eight cents ($0.08) per share on outstanding FNFG common stock. 
The Company's Board of Directors also declared a quarterly preferred stock dividend of $0.539063 per share on its fixed-to-floating rate perpetual non-cumulative preferred stock, Series B. 
Both dividends will be payable on November 16, 2015 to shareholders of record on November 5, 2015. 
About First Niagara 
First Niagara, through its wholly owned subsidiary, First Niagara Bank, N.A., is a multi-state community-oriented bank with approximately 390 branches, $39 billion in assets, $29 billion in deposits, and approximately 5,400 employees providing financial services to individuals, families and businesses across New York, Pennsylvania, Connecticut and Massachusetts. For additional information on First Niagara, visit us at www.firstniagara.com , follow us on Twitter @FirstNiagara, or like us on Facebook at FirstNiagaraBank. First Niagara Contacts Investors: Ram Shankar Senior Vice President, Investor Relations (716) 270-8623 News Media: David Lanzillo Senior Vice President, Corporate Communications (716) 819-5780 Related Articles
